column1: Congratulations @DougBurgum and @BrentSanfordND! I look forward to another four years of working with you on behalf of the people of North Dakota. https://t.co/xSFpw5T7wk
I look forward to helping @realDonaldTrump secure another victory in North Dakota! https://t.co/Jkz1qeCial
Today we celebrate our great nation. Wishing you all a very safe and happy 4th of July! God Bless America! #Happy4thofJuly https://t.co/ka5d04p76n

Beautiful night for the 58th Annual Congressional Baseball Game for Charity. It’s the top of the third inning and Republicans are at bat looking to score some runs. Tune in to CSPAN2 or watch the live stream at https://t.co/ulkn1HmNds https://t.co/d4qMxq6TWt

This morning we had batting practice and walkthrough at Nationals Park for the Annual Congressional Baseball Game for Charity tonight. Looking forward to playing in a Major League stadium for a good cause and winning one for the GOP! https://t.co/4RWInswL4a
Congratulations @realDonaldTrump! Look forward to working with you over the next six years to #KeepAmericaGreat https://t.co/t5MnHjINb6

Today we honor the brave men and women who have sacrificed so much for our country and for the freedoms we all enjoy. With a grateful heart we remember them this #MemorialDay & everyday. https://t.co/4U8bzjG4OM
Congratulations https://t.co/55KabEcpWb

It's been an honor to serve this great state and I got to share the work I've done these past few months during a stop in Hillsboro on Monday. I look forward to visiting with even more North Dakotans in Valley City tonight.  https://t.co/PreeH8BjKO

That’s not how this works. That is not how any of this works. Banks make loans. Companies operate pipelines which are without a doubt the safest way to transport oil.  ND is proud to power the world. Let’s get more pipe in the ground not less. @EnergyTransfer @WellsFargo https://t.co/calqdIY7Z0

@McFeely_Inforum Hey Mike you can follow our official page at @RepArmstrongND. This is my campaign page where I will occasionally talk about politics. You can follow my personal page @armstrong_km but that’s mostly baseball and sports stuff.

You weren’t invited as a potential candidate. You were there as a former VP. And to tell our allies that we shouldn’t criticize each other in public while slamming your own country in public seems a tad hypocritical....
If you are going to run for President then run but trashing your own country on the world stage is bad form. https://t.co/24stcdxuyx

This is one of the first events from my childhood that I clearly remember. An entire nation watched in wonder which turned to sadness and horror. If you have a moment please watch President Reagan’s remarks. https://t.co/pP3KuixWSU

.@SpeakerPelosi a decision as significant as denying @realDonaldTrump an invitation to deliver the State of the Union deserves a vote. Bring it to the floor so every member of Congress can weigh in. I think you know that the resolution would pass with democratic support. #SOTU

Of all of Dr. King’s quotes this is my favorite. It is succinct and impactful.  The message is direct and the logic is unassailable. We have come a long way in and have a long way to go. Thank you for sharing @DougBurgum https://t.co/tJexlNoinV
